title: FS: T206 Hugh Duffy (Tolstoi) PSA 5, tough front/back combo $645 delivered..
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Hugh Duffy (Tolstoi) PSA 5, tough front/back combo $645 delivered..
posts.post_content:
SGC 50 Merkle Hindu..Near impossible combo, card is a very vibrant orange color, very orange, big white borders. PSA only shows 2 graded of all grades...$1175 delivered **SOLD**

PSA 5 Duffy Tolstoi..Card is absolutely perfectly centered. Very high end 5, nice WST, extremely sharp corners for the grade....$675 delivered, Price reduced to $645, thanks for looking... **SOLD**
Duffy still available, well centered and strong card...
